resources.string: Spend Your Time Wisely and Keep track of it because, Time is free, but it is priceless. You can not own it, but you can use it. You can\'t keep it, but you can spend it.And once it is lost, you can never get it back. The thing is, we all have this account available to us . We all have 86,400 seconds to spend every day, and at the end of the day, theyâ€™re gone.
